sponsor: Wyeth is now a wholly owned subsidiary of Pfizer
briefTitle: Study Evaluating 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine in Healthy Japanese Infants
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Open-Label Trial Evaluating the Safety, Tolerability, and Immunogenicity of a 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine in Healthy Infants in Japan
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and immunogenicity of the 13-valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine (13vPnC) in infants of Japanese descent.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Achieving Antibody Level ≥ 0.35 μg/mL in the 13vPnC Group After the 3-Dose Infant Series
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: one month after 3-dose infant series (at 7 months of age)
